name: Piddly Pursuits
description:
Piddly --- small, insignificant, tiny.
Thats what they were. Thats what they are lovingly called.

Become a part of their story, of a pursuit to be more than what they were supposed to be.




-- Challenging game mechanics of controlling a character which itself has fixed repeated pattern of movement.
-- Unique visual style and game graphics.
-- Completely procedurally generated content. Provides a different challenge every time.
-- Get a new look every day!
-- Complete Game Center integration.
-- Capture video of your gameplay and save or share it with your friends.
